channel.title: Black Besa stops responding when loading next map after bm_c2a4h
channel.description:
Edit: I think that it may be the second map of surface tension that i cannot load when I try to open the door and load bm_c2a5a it says loading but no longer responds and even when left like this for 30 minutes nothing happens
I have tried the console and then map bm_c2a5a but it still stops responding I can load bm_c2a5b so this is not a problem with all maps can anyone upload their map so that i can check if mine is corrupted?
Installed Physical Memory (RAM) 6.00 GB Total Physical Memory 5.99 GB Available Physical Memory 4.00 GB Total Virtual Memory 12.0 GB
System specs OS: Windows 7 Home Premium 64-bit (6.1, Build 7601) Service Pack 1 (7601.win7sp1_gdr.120503-2030) Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7 CPU X 940 @ 2.13GHz (8 CPUs), ~2.1GHz DirectX Version: DirectX 11
------------- Card name: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 285M Display Memory: 3811 MB Dedicated Memory: 1001 MB Shared Memory: 2810 MB Current Mode: 1920 x 1200 (32 bit) (60Hz) Driver Version: 8.17.12.9610 I have two of these in a SLI configuration
If there is any thing else that i could add that would be helpful let me know

item.title: Black Besa stops responding when loading next map after bm_c2a4h
item.dc:creator: prettycool
item.description:
I am without internet at the moment, I am posting this from my phone, I just wanted to bump this again in hopes that it will be seen by someone who knows how to solve it.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Besa stops responding when loading next map after bm_c2a4h
item.dc:creator: prettycool
item.description:
lexa2:

looking at the specs
Hmm, so you have SLI config comprised of MOBILE versions of GPUs? Had you tried turning SLI off? How much system RAM do you have (can’t see it in the specs posted)?

I will try turning it off

Installed Physical Memory (RAM) 6.00 GB
Total Physical Memory 5.99 GB
Available Physical Memory 4.00 GB
Total Virtual Memory 12.0 GB
Available Virtual Memory 4.62 GB

ya I need to get more but I have been putting it off.

Post script
sorry for slow response I am only occasionally checking to see if the thread has any replys

Read full topic

item.source: Black Besa stops responding when loading next map after bm_c2a4h

item.title: Black Besa stops responding when loading next map after bm_c2a4h
item.dc:creator: prettycool
item.description:
lexa2:

it’d more likely to be related to the combination of the effects/materials/models game is told to use with this map and the specifics of your system hardware/software (which you hadn’t included in your report hint).

Much obliged I will edit my main post with the info post haste.

Read full topic
item.source: Black Besa stops responding when loading next map after bm_c2a4h

item.title: Black Besa stops responding when loading next map after bm_c2a4h
item.dc:creator: lexa2
item.description:
/cygdrive/c/Games-Win/Steam/steamapps/sourcemods/BMS/maps$ md5sum.exe bm_c2a5a.bsp
bff4400613ac6401c5f34c216909bb21 *bm_c2a5a.bsp

P.S. I don’t think the problem is really with the corrupted map file (but who knows, check md5sum to match what I had posted above), it’d more likely to be related to the combination of the effects/materials/models game is told to use with this map and the specifics of your system hardware/software (which you hadn’t included in your report hint).

Read full topic
